volunteer.position: Lector at the Basilica of the Sacred Heart
volunteer.summary: Read one of three readings in front of mass attendees of a basilica of max capacity 1000 people
highlights: Volunteered all four years, requested to read at President Fr. Robert A. Dowd's inauguration.

education.institution: Mendoza College of Business - The University of Notre Dame
courses: Machine Learning, Art of Investing, Data Wranging, Data Management, Predictive Analytics, Data Analysis with Python

awards.title: Brennan Family Scholar
awards.summary: The Cathy and Jack Brennan Scholarship is a 100k merit scholarship given to students who promise academic achievement and merit. Less than 1% of all Notre Dame applicants received a merit schoalrship.

awards.title: Glynn Family Scholars Program
awards.summary: The Glynn Family Honors Program at Notre Dame is a highly selective academic initiative, accepting less than 1% of applicants and offering advanced coursework, research opportunities, and mentorship for top-performing students.

publications.name: Readability of Water Reports in the U.S.: Disclosing Information Biases Through Flesch Readability Ease Scores
publications.summary: This paper analyzes more than 1,000 water reports in the U.S. using readability metrics. With Python, each PDF was parsed and text-extracted using optical character recognition. A dataframe displayed each water reportâ€™s readability through multiple readability indices. All processes disclosed a grave information bias that needs resolution.

projects.name: Elite College Admisisons
projects.summary: This project encompassed exploratory data analysis, data cleaning, and the implementation of three models (linear regression, random forest, and XGBoost) to predict rel_apply, with feature importance analysis and RMSE evaluation used to assess model performance and identify key predictive variables.
